name: Ham Pinwheels
author: Talia Snider
summary: Your guests will love these appetizers. They are great little finger foods for any occasion. You can make them the night before or the day of. Both ways work fine.
ingredients: 2 (2 ounce) packages thinly sliced deli ham (such as Buddig®)
1  cucumber - peeled, seeded, and thinly sliced
¼ teaspoon southwest seasoning (such as Emeril's Southwest Essence®), or to taste
directions: Place a tortilla onto a work surface and spread about 2 tablespoons cream cheese evenly over the tortilla

Layer 3 slices of deli ham over half the tortilla, followed by about 2 tablespoons Cheddar cheese, 3 or 4 cucumber slices, 2 or 3 lettuce leaves, a small sprinkle of bacon bits, and a pinch of southwest seasoning
Leave half the tortilla uncovered by fillings except the cream cheese
Starting from the layered half of the tortilla, tightly roll into a log and secure with toothpicks
Slice rolls into 1/2-inch thick slices to serve
